creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Grey, elevated subway station with ascending steps and yellow railing on L; two long columns L of center; yellow gate with double doors and overhead spotlight on R; tracks and platform in foreground; small skylight, LL foreground, on platform
medium: India ink and watercolor on paper
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1986.
title: Deep Station
